snippet: Calgary rookie Johnny Gaudreau continued his torrid scoring Saturday night with two goals to lead the Flames to a 4-1 victory over the Edmonton Oilers on Saturday night....

headline.print_headline: Gaudreau Scores Two More as Flames Beat Oilers 4-1
headline.main: Gaudreau Scores Two More as Flames Beat Oilers 4-1

lead_paragraph: Calgary rookie Johnny Gaudreau continued his torrid scoring Saturday night with two goals to lead the Flames to a 4-1 victory over the Edmonton Oilers on Saturday night.
